data.name: bicycle
data.sentence: Lets go riding bicycle this weekend!
data.definition: a two-wheeled vehicle that you sit on and move by turning the two pedals

languages.tr_sentence: 這周末我們一起去騎腳踏車吧!

data.name: motorcycle
data.sentence: My dad rides me to school on a motorcycle.
data.definition: a vehicle with two wheels and an engine

languages.tr_sentence: 我的爸爸騎摩托車載我去上學。

data.name: airplane
data.sentence: I will take a airplane to Japan this summer
data.definition: a vehicle designed for air travel that has wings and one or more engines

languages.tr_sentence: 在這個暑假我將要搭飛機去日本。

data.name: airplane
data.sentence: I will take a airplane to Japan this summer
data.definition: a vehicle designed for air travel that has wings and one or more engines

languages.tr_sentence: 在這個暑假我將要搭飛機去日本。

data.name: bus
data.sentence: I alwaays take a bus to school.
data.definition: a large vehicle in which people are driven from one place to another

languages.tr_sentence: 我總是搭公車去上學。

data.name: train
data.sentence: The train was not free of the station yet
data.definition: a railway engine connected to carriages for carrying people or to wheeled containers for carrying goods

languages.tr_sentence: 火車還沒有離開車站。

data.name: truck
data.sentence: This truck is full of toys.
data.definition: a large road vehicle that is used for transporting large amounts of goods

languages.tr_sentence: 這輛卡車載滿了玩具。

data.name: boat
data.sentence: My father to go fishing on the sea tomorrow.
data.definition: a small vehicle for travelling on water

languages.tr_sentence: 我爸爸明天將出海捕魚。

data.name: traffic light
data.sentence: Turn left at the traffic lights.
data.definition: one of a set of red, yellow, and green lights that control the movement of vehicles, usually at a point where two or more roads join

languages.tr_sentence: 在紅綠燈那裡向左轉。

data.name: fire hydrant
data.sentence: On every floor there is a fire hydrant.
data.definition: a large pipe in the street that firefighters can get water from to use to stop fires from burning

languages.tr_sentence: 每個樓層都有消防栓。

data.name: stop sign
data.sentence: You always have to stop at a stop sign.
data.definition: a sign on the road that tells drivers of vehicles to stop and not to continue until it is safe

languages.tr_sentence: 當遇到停車標誌時你一定要停下來。

data.name: parking meter
data.sentence: He is putting money in the parking meter.
data.definition: a device at the side of the road that you put money into so that you can leave your vehicle there for a particular amount of time

languages.tr_sentence: 他正把錢投入停車收費機中。

data.name: bench
data.sentence: They're sitting on a bench in the park.
data.definition: a long, usually hard seat for two or more people, often found in public places

languages.tr_sentence: 他們正坐在公園裡的一張長凳上。

data.name: horse
data.sentence: I'm learning how to ride a horse.
data.definition: a large animal with four legs that people ride on or use for carrying things or pulling vehicles

languages.tr_sentence: 我正在學習如何騎馬。

data.name: skis
data.sentence: The girl asked her father to buy a pair of skis for her.
data.definition: one of a pair of long, flat narrow pieces of wood or plastic that curve up at the front and are fastened to boots so that the wearer can move quickly and easily over snow

languages.tr_sentence: 那個女孩拜託她的爸爸幫他買一個滑雪板。

data.name: snowboard
data.sentence: Snowboard parks are becoming more popular.
data.definition: to slide on the snow by standing on a specially shaped board

languages.tr_sentence: 單板滑雪公園越來越受歡迎。

data.name: cow
data.sentence: Cows supply us milk .
data.definition: a large female farm animal kept to produce meat and milk

languages.tr_sentence: 母牛供給我們牛奶。

data.name: backpack
data.sentence: Is there a pencil in your backpack?
data.definition: a large bag used to carry things on your back, used especially by people who go camping or walking

languages.tr_sentence: 你的背包裡有鉛筆嗎？

data.name: umbrella
data.sentence: May i borrow your umbrella ?
data.definition: a device for protection against the rain

languages.tr_sentence: 我可以借用你的雨傘嗎？

data.name: handbag
data.sentence: This handbag is very beautiful.
data.definition: a small bag for money, keys, make-up, carried especially by women

languages.tr_sentence: 這個手提包很漂亮。

data.name: tie
data.sentence: She bought her husband a tie.
data.definition: a long, thin piece of material that is worn under a shirt collar, especially by men, and tied in a knot at the front

languages.tr_sentence: 她買給她先生一條領帶。

data.name: frisbee
data.sentence: I like to play frisbee with my dog.
data.definition: a brand name for a circular piece of plastic with a curved edge that is thrown between people as a game

languages.tr_sentence: 我喜歡跟我的狗一起玩飛盤。

data.name: suitcase
data.sentence: I crowded everything into my suitcase.
data.definition: a large, rectangular container with a handle, for carrying clothes and possessions while travelling

languages.tr_sentence: 我把所有的東西都塞進了行李箱。

data.name: fork
data.sentence: He picked up his fork and knife.
data.definition: a small object with three or four points and a handle, that you use to pick up food and eat with

languages.tr_sentence: 他拿起他的刀叉。

data.name: spoon
data.sentence: She stirred her coffee with a spoon.
data.definition: an object consisting of a round, hollow part and a handle, used for mixing, serving, and eating food

languages.tr_sentence: 她用湯匙攪拌她的咖啡.

data.name: kite
data.sentence: Your kite looks like bird.
data.definition: a frame covered with cloth or plastic and joined to a long string, that you fly in the air when the weather is windy

languages.tr_sentence: 你的風箏看起來像一隻鳥。

data.name: baseball glove
data.sentence: My mother buy a baseball glove for my birthday.
data.definition: a padded glove with webbing between the thumb and index finger, worn by baseball players

languages.tr_sentence: 我媽媽給我買了一個棒球手套作為生日禮物。

data.name: baseball bat
data.sentence: She has a baseball bat.
data.definition: an implement used in baseball by the batter.

languages.tr_sentence: 她有一個棒球拍。

data.name: couch
data.sentence: There are many couch in the park.
data.definition: a long, usually hard seat for two or more people, often found in public places

languages.tr_sentence: 公園裡有很多長椅

data.name: chair
data.sentence: Chair can be made by wooden.
data.definition: a seat for one person that has a back, usually four legs, and sometimes two arms

languages.tr_sentence: 椅子可以用木頭做成

data.name: potted plant
data.sentence: You can plant whatever you want on your potted plant .
data.definition: a plant that is grown in a pot

languages.tr_sentence: 你可以在你的盆栽上種任何東西

data.name: bed
data.sentence: It's 10 o'clock now,time to go to bed.
data.definition: a large, rectangular piece of furniture, often with four legs, used for sleeping on

languages.tr_sentence: 10點了，該去睡覺了

data.name: dining table
data.sentence: I used to have dinner with my family on dining table.
data.definition: a table at which meals are eaten

languages.tr_sentence: 我習慣在餐桌上跟我的家人吃晚餐

data.name: toilet
data.sentence: Toilets always appear in the corner of a building.
data.definition: a room or small building in a public place in which there are several toilets

languages.tr_sentence: 洗手間常常出現在建築物的角落

data.name: TV
data.sentence: As the time go on,people usually use cellphones instead of TV.
data.definition: a system for transmitting visual images and sound that are reproduced on screens, chiefly used to broadcast programs for entertainment, information, and education.

languages.tr_sentence: 隨著時間過去，人們漸漸以手機代替電視

data.name: laptop
data.sentence: My father is an engineer, so he always carry a laptop.
data.definition: a computer that is portable and suitable for use while traveling.

languages.tr_sentence: 我爸爸是個工程師，所以常常看到他帶著一台筆記型電腦

data.name: couch
data.sentence: Before surfing, you need to have a surfboard first.
data.definition: a long, narrow streamlined board used in surfing.

languages.tr_sentence: 衝浪之前你需要一塊衝浪板

data.name: tennis racket
data.sentence: A profetional tennis racket cost a lot.
data.definition: an object used for hitting the ball in various sports, consisting of a net fixed tightly to a round frame with a long handle

languages.tr_sentence: 一個專業的網球拍價格不斐

data.name: cup
data.sentence: I get a cup from exchange presents on Christmas.
data.definition: a small, round container, often with a handle, used for drinking tea, coffee, etc.

languages.tr_sentence: 我從聖誕節交換禮物裡得到一個馬克杯

data.name: cell phone
data.sentence: Cellphone is too hard for my grandparents to learn.
data.definition: a phone that is connected to the phone system by radio instead of by a wire, and can be used anywhere where its signals can be received

languages.tr_sentence: 對我爺爺奶奶來說，他們很難學會如何使用行動電話

data.name: microwave
data.sentence: You can't put anything content mental into microwave.
data.definition: an electric oven that uses waves of energy to cook or heat food quickly

languages.tr_sentence: 你不能把任何含有金屬的東西放進微波爐裡。

data.name: oven
data.sentence: Cake is made by oven.
data.definition: the part of a cooker with a door, used to bake or roast food

languages.tr_sentence: 蛋糕是用烤箱做出來的

data.name: toaster
data.sentence: Compare with oven, toaster is more convenient to toast.
data.definition: an electric device for making toast

languages.tr_sentence: 比起烤箱，拿烤土司機來烤土司更方便

data.name: sink
data.sentence: Before you cock vegetable, you have to wash it in the sink.
data.definition: a bowl that is attached to the wall in a kitchen or bathroom in which you wash dishes or your hands, etc.

languages.tr_sentence: 在你煮菜之前，你需要先在水槽把他們洗乾淨

data.name: refrigerator
data.sentence: It's hard to image that how ancient peaple keep food fresh without refrigerator.
data.definition: a piece of kitchen equipment that uses electricity to preserve food at a cold temperature

languages.tr_sentence: 很難想像古人在沒有冰箱時要怎麼讓食物保鮮

data.name: book
data.sentence: A good book can bring you to a another world.
data.definition: a set of pages that have been fastened together inside a cover to be read or written in

languages.tr_sentence: 一本好的書可以帶你去一個不一樣的世界

data.name: clock
data.sentence: People without clock in ancient, work when sunrise and rest when sunset.
data.definition: a device for measuring and showing time, usually found in or on a building and not worn by a person

languages.tr_sentence: 古人沒有時鐘，都是在日出時工作日落實休息

data.name: vase
data.sentence: There are lots of image on the vase to make it more beautiful.
data.definition: a container for holding flowers or for decoration

languages.tr_sentence: 花瓶上有很多圖案讓他看起更漂亮

data.name: scissors
data.sentence: You must be careful when using scissors.
data.definition: a device used for cutting materials such as paper, cloth, and hair, consisting of two sharp blades that are joined in the middle, and two handles with holes to put your fingers through

languages.tr_sentence: 在使用剪刀時要小心

data.name: teddy bear
data.sentence: Everyone has their own teddy bear when thy was young.
data.definition: a soft toy bear

languages.tr_sentence: 每個人在小時候的時候都有一隻泰迪熊

data.name: hair drier
data.sentence: I always dry my hair by hair drier.
data.definition: an electrical device, usually held in the hand, that blows out hot air and is used for drying a person's hair

languages.tr_sentence: 我都用吹風機吹乾我的頭髮

data.name: toothbrush
data.sentence: I use toothbrush to brush my teeth everyday.
data.definition: a small brush with a long handle that you use to clean your teeth

languages.tr_sentence: 我每天都用牙刷刷我的牙齒
